text: 第二循環パイプに亀裂発生。 / 震度1480。 / 限界震度オーバー。
translation: Cracks developing in the second circulation pipe. / Depth 1480. / Exceeding critical depth limit.
grammar: に (location particle) + 発生 (occurrence) - indicates where something is occurring

text: 目標とまだ接触していないわ。 / 続けて。 / アスカ、どう? / まだ持ちそう。
translation: We haven't made contact with the target yet. / Continue. / Asuka, how is it? / I can still hold on.
grammar: 〜ていない (negative progressive form) - indicates action has not yet occurred; 〜そう (auxiliary) - appears that/seems like

text: さっさと終わらせてシャワー浴びたい。 / 近くにいい温泉があるわ。終わったらいきましょう。もう少し頑張って。
translation: I want to finish this quickly and take a shower. / There's a nice hot spring nearby. Let's go when we're done. Hang in there a little longer.
grammar: 〜たい (desiderative) - expresses desire; 〜たら (conditional) - when/if; 〜て form (imperative) - command/request

text: 限界深度、プラス120。
translation: Critical depth, plus 120.
grammar: Technical measurement statement - noun + numeric value

text: EVA2号機、プログライフ喪失。限界深度、プラス200。 / 勝脇さん、もうこれ以上は、今 / 度は人が乗っているんですよ。
translation: EVA Unit 02, progressive knife lost. Critical depth, plus 200. / Katsuragi-san, we can't go any further, this time / there's a person riding in it.
grammar: 〜ている (progressive) - indicates ongoing state; これ以上 (no more than this) - expression of limit

text: この作戦の責任者は私です。続けてください。
translation: I am the person in charge of this operation. Please continue.
grammar: 〜です (copula) - formal statement of identity; 〜てください (polite request) - please do

text: ミサトの言う通りよ。大丈夫、まだ行けるわ。
translation: Just as Misato says. It's okay, I can still go.
grammar: 〜通り (just as, according to) - indicates conformity; 〜る/える potential form - expresses ability

text: 深度1780。目標予測修正地点です。
translation: Depth 1780. This is the revised target prediction point.
grammar: Compound noun construction - multiple nouns stacked to create technical term

text: いた。
translation: There it is.
grammar: Past tense た form of いる - sudden realization/discovery

text: 目標を映像で確認。 / 捕獲準備。
translation: Target confirmed on visual. / Prepare for capture.
grammar: を + で (particle combination) - object marker + method/means; Noun-only statements common in military/operational contexts

text: お互いに大流で流されているから、接触のチャンスは… / 一度しかないわよ / わかってる、任せて / 目標 / は接触まで、 / あと30
translation: We're both being carried by the current, so the chance for contact is... / Only once. / I know, leave it to me. / Target / until contact, / 30 more.
grammar: 〜ている (progressive) - ongoing action; 〜しかない (only) - exclusive limit; 〜て form (imperative) - casual command

text: 相対速度2.2、軸戦に乗ったわ
translation: Relative velocity 2.2, I'm on axis.
grammar: 〜た (past tense) - completed action; Technical/military terminology for alignment

text: 電磁柵展開、問題なし / 目標、捕獲しました
translation: Electromagnetic cage deployed, no problems. / Target captured.
grammar: 〜なし (without) - negative noun; 〜ました (polite past) - formal completion report

text: ナイスアスカ
translation: Nice, Asuka!
grammar: English loanword used as exclamation of approval

text: 捕獲作業終了 / これより浮上します
translation: Capture operation complete. / Now surfacing.
grammar: これより (from this point) - formal transition marker; 〜ます (polite form) - formal announcement

text: アスカ大丈夫 / あったりまえよ / アンズルより産むがやすしってね / やっぱ楽勝じゃん
translation: Asuka, are you okay? / Of course! / You know, giving birth is easier than worrying about it. / I knew it would be a piece of cake.

vocabulary.word: 案ずるより産むが易し
vocabulary.reading: あんずるよりうむがやすし
vocabulary.meaning: giving birth is easier than worrying (proverb)

grammar: 〜ってね (casual quotative) - you know; じゃん (casual copula) - casual assertion, typical of youth speech

text: でもこれじゃプラグスーツというよりサウナスーツよ
translation: But this is more like a sauna suit than a plug suit.
grammar: 〜というより (rather than) - comparison marker indicating one thing is more appropriate than another

text: はぁ早いとコーンセンに入りたい / 緊張がいっぺんに溶けたみたいね / そう / あなたも今日の作戦怖かったんでしょ
translation: I want to get in the hot spring quickly. / It seems like all your tension melted away at once, huh? / Yeah. / You were scared of today's operation too, weren't you?
grammar: 〜たい (desiderative) - want to; 〜みたい (resemblance) - seems like; 〜んでしょ (explanatory + presumption) - seeking confirmation

text: まあね、下手に手を出せば、あれの二の前ですものね / そうね、セカンドインパクト / 二度とごめんだわ
translation: Well yeah, if we handled it poorly, we'd end up just like that. / Right, Second Impact. / Never again.
grammar: 〜ば (conditional) - if; 〜ですもの (explanatory) - because/you see; だわ (feminine sentence ending)

text: なによこれ
translation: What the heck is this?
grammar: なによ (what + よ particle) - emphatic/annoyed question, feminine speech

text: まずいわ、ウッカを始めたのよ / 計算より早すぎるわ / キャッチャーは? / とても持ちません
translation: This is bad, it's started to hatch. / It's way too fast compared to our calculations. / What about the catcher? / It can't hold at all.
grammar: 〜始める (start doing) - auxiliary verb; 〜より (than) - comparison; 〜すぎる (too much) - excess

text: 捕獲中止、キャッチャ / ーを破棄 / くっ!
translation: Abort capture, discard the catcher. / Damn!
grammar: Noun-based commands common in emergency situations; くっ - interjection of frustration

text: 作戦変更!使徒殲滅を最優先!
translation: Change of operation! Angel annihilation is top priority!
grammar: 〜を (object marker) + 最優先 (top priority) - marking what receives priority status

text: 2号機は撤収作業しつつ、検討準備! / 待ってました!
translation: Unit 02, prepare for combat while withdrawing! / I've been waiting for this!
grammar: 〜しつつ (while doing) - simultaneous actions; 〜ました (polite past) - expresses completion/anticipation

text: しまった!ナイフは落としちゃったんだわ! / 正面! / ダラスト放出!
translation: Oh no! I dropped the knife! / Dead ahead! / Release ballast!
grammar: 〜ちゃった (casual past completion) - regretful completion; 〜んだわ (explanatory + feminine ending)

text: は、早 / い!
translation: It's f-fast!
grammar: Exclamatory い-adjective; stuttering indicated by splitting the word

text: おまけに視界は悪い、やたらと熱い、スーツがべったりしてて気持ち悪い、もう最低ね / アツカ?
translation: On top of that, visibility is bad, it's ridiculously hot, the suit is clinging and feels gross—this is the worst. / Asuka?
grammar: 〜てて (casual progressive) - casual form of ている; List of complaints connected with commas

text: 今のうちに初号機のナイフを落とすわ、受け取って、了解
translation: I'll drop Unit 01's knife while I can. Catch it. Roger.
grammar: 〜のうちに (while) - doing something during a limited time window; 〜て (imperative) - command form

text: やば、まだなの?ジンジー!
translation: Oh no, not yet? Shinji!
grammar: 〜なの (explanatory question) - feminine questioning; Elongated name (シンジー) shows urgency/distress

text: ナイフ到達まで、あと40 / 使徒急速接近中!
translation: 40 more until knife arrival. / Angel approaching rapidly!
grammar: 〜まで (until) - time limit marker; 〜中 (in progress) - ongoing action marker

text: いやー!来ないでー! / あー!早く来てー!
translation: Nooo! Don't come! / Ahh! Come quickly!
grammar: 〜ないで (negative request) - please don't; 〜て (request) - please do; Extended vowels (ー) show emotional distress
